item.title: Cassie’s Husband Reportedly Sent Angry Text to Diddy
item.description: Reports claim Cassie Ventura’s husband exchanged heated words with Sean “Diddy” Combs following renewed attention on Cassie’s lawsuit. Neither side has publicly commented on the messages.

item.title: Diddy’s Relationships Reveal a Dark Pattern
item.description: As multiple lawsuits and testimonies surface, new attention is being paid to Sean “Diddy” Combs’ past relationships and the troubling patterns alleged by several former partners.

item.title: Diddy's Defense Tries to Prove Cassie Was a Willing Participant
item.description: Sean “Diddy” Combs’ defense team continues to dispute Cassie Ventura’s allegations in court, questioning her testimony as both sides present their cases in the ongoing legal proceedings.

item.title: Diddy's Defense Tried to Prove Cassie Enjoyed the Freak-Offs
item.description: In court, Sean “Diddy” Combs’ legal team challenged Cassie Ventura’s testimony, attempting to question her account. Her statements remain a pivotal part of the ongoing case.

item.title: Everything Netflix Didn't Show You About "Unknown Number"
item.description: Netflix’s Unknown Number tells the story of cyberbullying in Beal City, Michigan. But key details about Kendra Licari’s case and its fallout were left out of the documentary.

item.title: IShowSpeed Met Chinese Women Seeking Marriage
item.description: During his China trip, IShowSpeed visited Shanghai’s “marriage market,” where women openly expressed interest in marrying him. He later praised his reception in state media as his streams went viral.

item.title: Kendra Hilty Speaks on Falling for Her Psychiatrist
item.description: Kendra Hilty says her psychiatrist blurred professional boundaries, leading her to believe she was in love. Her story has sparked debate about ethics, power dynamics, and trust in therapy.

item.title: Life on Anatan Island: One Woman, 32 Men
item.description: On Anatan Island, one woman lives with 32 men in a rare community dynamic. Her story has drawn worldwide attention, raising questions about culture, survival, and unconventional lifestyles.

item.title: Millionaire’s Son Taken and Sold
item.description: As a child, Mei Zhiqiang was kidnapped and sold to a wealthy family. His case drew national attention in China, highlighting the realities of child trafficking and the search for justice.

item.title: The Björk Stalker Case Explained
item.description: In the 1990s, Ricardo López became fixated on singer Björk and documented his disturbing plans. His tapes and writings revealed the dangers of obsession and led to an FBI investigation.

item.title: How China Reacted to IShowSpeed’s Visit
item.description: IShowSpeed’s recent trip to China sparked viral moments and global reactions online. From funny encounters to cultural surprises, his visit became one of his most talked-about adventures

item.title: The End of an Era: AOA Disbands
item.description: After more than a decade in K-pop, AOA has officially disbanded. The group, known for hits like Miniskirt and Heart Attack, leaves behind a lasting impact on fans and the industry.

item.title: Cassie’s Messages to Diddy Were Put Under a Microscope in Court
item.description: As part of the legal case against Sean “Diddy” Combs, Cassie Ventura’s messages were closely examined in court, offering new insight into her testimony and the broader allegations.

item.title: The Lindsay Hawker Case Explained
item.description: In 2007, 22-year-old Lindsay Hawker, a British teacher in Japan, was murdered by Tatsuya Ichihashi. After a lengthy manhunt, he was captured and sentenced to life in prison

item.title: K-Pop Star Ended Being Locked Up For 13 Years!
item.description: Chinese-Canadian singer Kris Wu was sentenced in 2022 to 13 years in prison in China for sex crimes. He will also be deported after serving his sentence, according to Chinese authorities.

item.title: What Happened in the Ruby Franke Case?
item.description: Former YouTube mom Ruby Franke was sentenced in 2024 after child abuse charges. Her journals revealed disturbing details as she preached parenting advice online while harming her own children.

item.title: Inside the Grueling 12-Hour Cross-Examination of Cassie Ventura
item.description: Cassie Ventura faced a 12-hour cross-examination in court as part of her case against Sean “Diddy” Combs. Her testimony has become a pivotal moment in the ongoing legal proceedings.

item.title: Ex-Girlfriend Testimony in Diddy Case
item.description: Sean “Diddy” Combs was arrested in 2025 following serious allegations. In court, testimony from an ex-girlfriend added new details to the case as prosecutors pursue charges against the music mogul.
